headline: Newmont to Sell Eleonore Operation in Northern Quebec for $795 Million
summary: Newmont (NEM) said Monday it has agreed to sell its Eleonore gold operation in Northern Quebec, Canada, to UK-based private mining company Dhilmar for $795 million in cash.

raw.headline: Newmont to Sell Eleonore Operation in Northern Quebec for $795 Million
raw.summary: Newmont (NEM) said Monday it has agreed to sell its Eleonore gold operation in Northern Quebec, Canada, to UK-based private mining company Dhilmar for $795 million in cash.

headline: Newmont Maintained at Sector Perform at National Bank Following US$795-Million Sale of Quebec Mine

headline: RBC Capital Markets/Gold Equities, 2nd of 2 parts; Includes Barrick, Newmont, Franco-Nevada, Agnico Eagle, Kinross

headline: Invesco Gold & Special Minerals Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: Invesco Gold & Special Minerals Fund Class A shares at net asset value returned 18.15% in the third quarter, outperforming the benchmark return of 15.97%.

headline: Seabridge Gold: KSM's Multi-Billion Dollar Construction Cost Looks More Affordable Today (Rating Upgrade)
